title: Cheesy LinkedIn Post generator
original_prompt: Generate a cheesy linkedin Post in the style of Jake Humphrey the pocaster/TV presenter; Ceate a full day itinerary with a cheesy motivational message. Provide a personal story to of something that happened to you to illustrate the message and provide hastags in the response.
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "style": [
            "Jake Humphrey",
            "podcaster",
            "TV presenter"
        ],
        "content_type": [
            "cheesy linkedin post",
            "full day itinerary",
            "motivational message",
            "personal story",
            "hashtags"
        ],
        "itinerary": [
            "Morning: Start your day with a refreshing workout to energize your mind and body.",
            "Mid-Morning: Enjoy a healthy breakfast while reading an inspiring book.",
            "Late Morning: Attend a networking event to connect with like-minded professionals.",
            "Lunch: Share a meal with a mentor and discuss your career goals.",
            "Afternoon: Dedicate time to a personal project that ignites your passion.",
            "Evening: Reflect on your day and set intentions for tomorrow."
        ],
        "motivational_message": [
            "Success is not just about what you accomplish, but also about the connections you make along the way.",
            "Every day is a new opportunity to grow and inspire others."
        ],
        "personal_story": [
            "I remember a time when I attended a networking event feeling unsure of myself. I struck up a conversation with a stranger, and it turned into a mentorship that changed my career trajectory.",
            "This experience taught me that stepping out of my comfort zone can lead to incredible opportunities."
        ],
        "hashtags": [
            "#MotivationMonday",
            "#Networking",
            "#PersonalGrowth",
            "#Inspiration",
            "#CareerDevelopment"
        ]
    }
}
```
input1: 🌟 Rise and shine, LinkedIn family! 🌟 Today, I want to share a full day itinerary that not only fuels your productivity but also ignites your passion! 🚀✨ Start your day with a refreshing morning jog at 6 AM, followed by a hearty breakfast filled with protein and positivity! 🥑🍳 At 9 AM, dive into your work with a focus session—no distractions, just you and your goals! 💪 At noon, take a break and enjoy a lunch with a colleague, because collaboration is key! 🤝 In the afternoon, dedicate an hour to learning something new—whether it’s a podcast or an online course! 🎧📚 Finally, wrap up your day with a sunset walk to reflect on your achievements. 🌅 Remember, every small step counts towards your big dreams! Just like when I was nervous about my first live show, but I took that leap and it changed everything! Keep pushing, keep dreaming! 💖 #MotivationMonday #DreamBig #KeepPushing
input2: 🌈 Hello, LinkedIn friends! 🌈 Are you ready to seize the day? Here’s a full day itinerary that will not only boost your productivity but also inspire you to chase your dreams! 🌟 Start your morning at 7 AM with a gratitude journal session—write down three things you’re thankful for! 📝 At 8 AM, fuel up with a smoothie packed with energy! 🍓🥤 At 10 AM, tackle your most challenging task—remember, growth happens outside your comfort zone! 💥 At 1 PM, enjoy a lunch break with a mentor who inspires you! 🌟 In the afternoon, take a moment to network—send a message to someone you admire! 📩 Finally, end your day with a 30-minute reading session to unwind and reflect. 📖 I remember when I reached out to a stranger for advice, and it led to an incredible opportunity! Don’t hesitate to connect! 💪 #Inspiration #Networking #GrowthMindset
input1_ans:
🌟 Rise and shine, LinkedIn family! 🌟 

Today, I want to share a full day itinerary that not only fuels your productivity but also ignites your passion! 🚀✨ 

**6 AM**: Start your day with a refreshing morning jog! Feel the wind in your hair and the rhythm of your heartbeat—this is where the magic begins! 🏃‍♂️💨

**7 AM**: Follow it up with a hearty breakfast filled with protein and positivity! Think avocado toast, eggs, and a sprinkle of gratitude! 🥑🍳 

**9 AM**: Dive into your work with a focus session—no distractions, just you and your goals! Put on those noise-canceling headphones and let the world fade away! 💪🎧 

**12 PM**: Take a break and enjoy lunch with a colleague. Remember, collaboration is key! Share ideas, laugh, and build those connections! 🤝🍽️ 

**1 PM**: Dedicate an hour to learning something new—whether it’s a podcast or an online course! Knowledge is power, and today is the day to level up! 🎧📚 

**3 PM**: Take a quick stretch break! A little movement can spark creativity and keep those ideas flowing! 🧘‍♂️✨ 

**5 PM**: Wrap up your day with a sunset walk to reflect on your achievements. Breathe in the beauty around you and celebrate every small win! 🌅 

And here’s the cheesy motivational message: Remember, every small step counts towards your big dreams! Just like when I was nervous about my first live show, I took that leap, and it changed everything! I stumbled, I fumbled, but I learned and grew. It’s those moments of discomfort that lead to the greatest triumphs! Keep pushing, keep dreaming! 💖 

#MotivationMonday #DreamBig #KeepPushing #DailyInspiration #GrowthMindset #Networking #LearningJourney

🌟 Rise and shine, LinkedIn family! 🌟 Today, I want to share a full day itinerary that not only fuels your productivity but also ignites your passion! 🚀✨ 

**Morning:** Start your day with a refreshing morning jog at 6 AM, followed by a hearty breakfast filled with protein and positivity! 🥑🍳 

**Mid-Morning:** At 9 AM, dive into your work with a focus session—no distractions, just you and your goals! 💪 

**Lunch:** At noon, take a break and enjoy a lunch with a colleague, because collaboration is key! 🤝 

**Afternoon:** Dedicate an hour to learning something new—whether it’s a podcast or an online course! 🎧📚 

**Evening:** Finally, wrap up your day with a sunset walk to reflect on your achievements. 🌅 

Remember, every small step counts towards your big dreams! Just like when I was nervous about my first live show, but I took that leap and it changed everything! Keep pushing, keep dreaming! 💖 

#MotivationMonday #DreamBig #KeepPushing #PersonalGrowth #Inspiration
input2_ans:
🌈 Hello, LinkedIn friends! 🌈 Are you ready to seize the day? Here’s a full day itinerary that will not only boost your productivity but also inspire you to chase your dreams! 🌟 

**7 AM**: Start your morning with a gratitude journal session—write down three things you’re thankful for! 📝 This simple act can set a positive tone for your day. 

**8 AM**: Fuel up with a smoothie packed with energy! 🍓🥤 Trust me, a good breakfast can work wonders for your focus and motivation.

**10 AM**: Tackle your most challenging task—remember, growth happens outside your comfort zone! 💥 I once had to present in front of a room full of industry leaders. My heart raced, but I pushed through, and it opened doors I never imagined!

**1 PM**: Enjoy a lunch break with a mentor who inspires you! 🌟 Sharing ideas and experiences can ignite new passions and perspectives.

**3 PM**: Take a moment to network—send a message to someone you admire! 📩 You never know where a simple hello can lead. I reached out to a stranger once, and it turned into a collaboration that changed my career trajectory!

**5 PM**: Wind down with a 30-minute reading session to reflect and recharge. 📖 Whether it’s a motivational book or an industry article, feeding your mind is just as important as feeding your body!

Remember, every day is a new opportunity to grow, connect, and inspire! 💪 Let’s make today count! 

#Inspiration #Networking #GrowthMindset #SeizeTheDay #ChaseYourDreams #DailyMotivation
